feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-16T12:07:09.200251Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Reddit 似乎正在恢复编辑/删除的评论</stitle>; <id>;https://kbin.social/m/RedditMigration/t/34112/Heads-up-Reddit-is -安静地恢复删除和覆盖帖子和</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T11:37:18.232864Z</更新>; <link href="https://kbin.social/m/ RedditMigration/t/34112/Heads-up-Reddit-is-quietly-restoring-deleted-AND-overwritten-posts-and"/>; <author>; <name>;kaimac</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=kaimac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Reddit 似乎正在恢复已编辑/删除的评论。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-appears-to-be-restoring-edited-deleted-comments" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354850" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;DevOps 是废话（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.massdriver.cloud/posts/devops-is-bullshit/</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T10:05:18.235177Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.massdriver.cloud/posts/devops-is-bullshit/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dijit</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dijit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://博客.massdriver.cloud/posts/devops-is-bullshit/devops-is-bullshit.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：150px；" />;<br />;DevOps 已经退化为部门和隧道愿景，团队使用 Terraform 和 YAML 来完成琐碎的任务。组织需要转向平台工程并支持开发人员自助服务。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#devops-is-bullshit-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36354049" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;每个工程师都应该知道的恼人的 A/B 测试错误</stitle>; <id>;https://posthog.com/blog/ab-testing-mistakes</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-16T11:05:18.239650Z</updated>; <link href="https://posthog.com/blog/ab-testing-mistakes"/>; <author>; <name>;Twixes</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Twixes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://posthog.com/og-images/blogab-testing -mistakes.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;A/B 测试中的第一个常见错误是在您的实验中包含实际不受您正在测试的更改影响的用户。它会稀释您的实验结果，使您更难确定更改的影响。另一个错误是没有将结果分解成子组，这可能会导致丢失重要的见解。最后，在没有决定应该持续多长时间的情况下开始实验可能会导致问题，例如过早结束实验或等待结果的时间过长。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#annoying-ab-testing-mistakes-every-engineer-should-know" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;停止称每次新灾难为“新常态”</stitle>; <id>;https://thewalrus.ca/stop-calling-each-new-灾难新常态/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T11:05:18.240188Z</更新>; <link href="https://thewalrus.ca/stop-calling-each-new- disaster-the-new-normal/"/>; <author>; <name>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; </author>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://walrus-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/img/Kopecky_NewNormal_1800.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;“新常态”一词已经成为陈词滥调，已经失去了惊吓和唤起人们的力量。它已经被标准化，连同它所描述的事物，例如气候变化。强大的利益集团，如石油巨头，告诉我们要“习惯它”而不是采取行动。语言在引导我们的注意力和激发行动方面很重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stop-calling-each-new-disaster-the-new-normal" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36354358" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;OpenSSL 1.1.1 生命周期即将结束</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/2023/06/ 15/1.1.1-EOL-提醒/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T07:05:18.240658Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.openssl.org/blog/blog/ 2023/06/15/1.1.1-EOL-Reminder/"/>; <author>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;OpenSSL 1.1.1 系列将于 2023 年 9 月 11 日结束生命周期 (EOL)。OpenSSL 1.1.1 的用户应考虑他们的选择并计划他们可能需要采取的任何行动。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#openssl-1-1-1-end-of-life-approaching" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36352547" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Rash – 鲁莽的球拍外壳</stitle>; <id>;https://rash-lang.org</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 16T09:05:18.242909Z</updated>; <link href="https://rash-lang.org"/>; <author>; <name>;nrabulinski</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=nrabulinski</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://rash-lang.org/rash-logo-blinking.gif" style="width: 220 像素；高度：144 像素；" />;<br />;Rash 结合了简单的类 shell 语法的便利性和成熟的编程语言 Racket 的强大功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rash-the-reckless-racket-shell" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36323457" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;从 kCTF VRP 的 42 个 Linux 内核漏洞提交中学习</stitle>; <id>;https://security.googleblog.com/2023/06/learnings-from-kctf-vrps-42 -linux.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T04:05:18.243385Z</更新>; <link href="https://security.googleblog.com/2023/06/learnings-from-kctf- vrps-42-linux.html"/>; <author>; <name>;tim_sw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tim_sw</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://www.gstatic.com/images/branding/googlelogo/2x/googlelogo_color_150x54dp.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：80px；" />;<br />;从 kCTF VRP 的 42 个 Linux 内核漏洞提交中学习 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#learnings-from-kctf-vrp-s-42-linux-kernel -exploits-submissions" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350693" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Louis Rossmann 呼吁社区离开 Reddit</stitle >; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZOm_UKGyrZg</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T06:05:18.244071Z</更新>; <link href="https://www .youtube.com/watch?v=ZOm_UKGyrZg"/>; <author>; <name>;hubraumhugo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hubraumhugo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/ZOm_UKGyrZg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#louis-rossmann-calls-community-to-leave-reddit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=36351830" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在上面放一个 io_uring——利用 Linux 内核</stitle>; <id>;https://chompie.rip/Blog+Posts/Put+an+io_uring+on+it+-+Exploiting+the+ Linux+内核</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T10:05:18.245075Z</updated>; <link href="https://chompie.rip/Blog+Posts/Put+an+io_uring+on+it+ -+Exploiting+the+Linux+Kernel"/>; <author>; <name>;fragmede</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fragmede</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;在上面放一个 io_uring - 利用 Linux 内核 - chompie <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#put-an-io-uring-on-it-利用-the-linux-kernel" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36353845" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Localrf – 来自随意摇晃视频的 Nerf </stitle>; <id>;https://localrf.github.io/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T00:05:18.246936Z</updated>; <link href="https://localrf.github .io/"/>; <author>; <name>;smusamashah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=smusamashah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;我们在优化辐射场的同时逐步添加帧并估计它们的姿势。局部辐射场在整个过程中动态分配。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#localrf-nerf-from-casual-shaky-videos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348483" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我 24 岁的 HP Jornada 可以做 iPhone 仍然做不到的事情</stitle>; <id>;https://raymii.org/s/blog/My_24_year_old_HP_Jornada_can_do_things_your_modern_iPhone_still_cant_do。 html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T21:05:18.247811Z</更新>; <link href="https://raymii.org/s/blog/My_24_year_old_HP_Jornada_can_do_things_your_modern_iPhone_still_cant_do.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jandeboevrie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jandeboevrie</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://raymii .org/s/inc/img/jornada-1.JPG" style="宽度：220px；高度：175px；" />;<br />;1999 年发布的 HP Jornada 720 是一款运行 Windows CE 或 Linux 的小型掌上电脑。它有一个 C 和 C++ 编译器、Python 和 Perl，使其成为一个成熟的开发工作站。与现代 iPhone 不同，它允许您在设备上开发、编译和运行本机软件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-24-year-old-hp-jornada-can-do-things-an-iphone-still-can-t-do" target="_blank ">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36346254" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;缓慢的赞美（2017）</stitle>; <id>;https://lareviewofbooks .org/article/in-praise-of-slowness/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T08:05:18.248673Z</更新>; <link href="https://lareviewofbooks.org/article/in -praise-of-slowness/"/>; <author>; <name>;the-mitr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=the-mitr</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;文章讨论了当代哲学和高等教育在快节奏、效率驱动的文化中所面临的挑战。它探讨了缓慢作为对危机的反应的概念，强调了沉思、抵抗和热爱阅读的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-praise-of-slowness-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36321938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;从开源中创收</stitle>; <id>;https://vadimdemedes.com/posts/generating-income-from-open-source</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-16T01:05:18.249518Z</updated>; <link href="https://vadimdemedes.com/posts/generating-income-from-open-source"/>; <author>; <name>;farazzz</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=farazzz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vadimdemedes.com/og/ posts/generating-income-from-open-source.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Ink 是一个开源项目，正在寻找产生收入和支持进一步发展的方法。个人捐赠是不够的，企业不太可能出于善意捐赠。开源项目应该为它们为公司提供的价值收费。建立在开源基础上的成功企业使用不同的方法来创收，例如提供不同的许可证、分层定价计划或开源和付费版本的组合。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#generating-income-from-open-source" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36349208" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;暗黑破坏神宣传文档 (1994) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.graybeardgames.com/download/diablo_pitch.pdf</id>; <updated>;2023 -06-16T00:05:18.250462Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.graybeardgames.com/download/diablo_pitch.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;bpierre</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bpierre</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#diablo-pitch -document-1994-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348356" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 正在删除通过采取他们的社区私有</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/14aeq5j/new_admin_post_if_a_moderator_team_unanimously/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T04:05:18.251388Z</updated >; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/ModCoord/comments/14aeq5j/new_admin_post_if_a_moderator_team_unanimously/"/>; <author>; <name>;Jimmc414</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=Jimmc414</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://external-preview.redd.it/4QG8xCazO9IE7CYVQd7M4ICpETI2Xj_tbos4K5p6_8o.png?width=1024&auto=webp&v =enabled&s=c35722975acbc564f2f4d2bb802c3fe55dbf2ff5" style="width: 220px; height: 100px;" />;<br />;没有修改过的普通用户不知道需要什么，因此在很大程度上不知道它直接影响到他们或被他们看到。并非所有版主都是天使但总的来说，无论规模大小，那些创建了可持续、持久社区的人都在做正确的事情，而 Reddit 的整个用户群通常看不到和低估了长时间、几个月和几年的维护、照顾和喂养。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-is-removing-moderators-that-protest-by-taking-their-communities-private" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350938" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Trsvid，TRS-80 模型 1、3 和 4 的视频播放器</stitle>; <id>;http://48k.ca /trsvid.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T04:05:18.252272Z</更新>; <link href="http://48k.ca/trsvid.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>; todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;这是一个 trsvid 的视频：你看到了什么有每秒 60 帧的全屏视频。好吧，在 Model 4 上。Model III 的处理速度刚刚超过 54 帧/秒，而 Model I 的处理速度刚刚超过 51 帧/秒。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trsvid-a-video-player-for-trs-80-model-1-3-and-4" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350789" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;无需借用检查、引用计数或垃圾收集的内存安全</stitle>; <id>;https://verdagon. dev/blog/single-ownership-without-borrow-checking-rc-gc</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T05:05:18.253202Z</updated>; <link href="https://verdagon.dev /blog/single-ownership-without-borrow-checking-rc-gc"/>; <author>; <name>;modernerd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=modernerd</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;单一所有权是一个比我们意识到的更容易也更强大的概念。它允许我们跟踪谁拥有数据并确保负责任的内存管理。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#memory-safety-without-borrow-checking-reference-counting-or-garbage-collection" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36351415" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;二甲双胍显示可预防长期 Covid</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/covid-19/ common-diabetes-drug-shown-prevent-long-covid</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T03:05:18.254077Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cidrap.umn.edu /covid-19/common-diabetes-drug-shown-prevent-long-covid"/>; <author>; <name>;sp332</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sp332 </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.cidrap.umn.edu/sites/default/files/styles/article_detail/public/article/Older%20woman %20taking%20a%20white%20pill.jpg?itok=paYdNBhn" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;既往感染与 COVID-19 检测呈阴性显着相关，而柏林私人住宿的感染率高于酒店住宿。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#metformin-shown-to-prevent-long-covid" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36350280" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;软件工作量估算主要是虚假研究（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://shape-of-code.com/2021/01/17/software- effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-15T23:05:18.254678Z</updated>; <link href="https://shape-of-code.com/ 2021/01/17/software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research/"/>; <author>; <name>;greghn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =greghn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;工作量估算是任何项目、软件或其他方面的重要组成部分。然而，软件工程的研究人员在获取现实估计数据方面受到限制，导致使用了小而过时的数据集。机器学习技术在软件工程研究中已成为一种趋势，但研究人员通常依赖于 1980 年代至 90 年代的微小数据集，而不是利用更大、更相关的数据集。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#software-effort-estimation-is-mostly-fake-research-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36348007" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一切都必须支付两次（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.raptitude.com/2022/01/everything-must -支付两次/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T07:05:18.255160Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.raptitude.com/2022/01/everything -must-be-paid-for-twice/"/>; <author>; <name>;ColinWright</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ColinWright</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.raptitude.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/claudia-rancourt-yEp5-D-JthU-unsplash.jpg" 风格= “宽度：220 像素；高度：147 像素；” />;<br />;我们购买的大多数东西都必须支付两次。第一个价格是获得物品的成本，而第二个价格是获得其利益所需的努力和主动性。只支付第一个价格就像把钱扔掉，因为只有支付第二个价格才能获得奖励。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#everything-must-be-paid-for-twice-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36338962" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WinFsp · Windows 文件系统代理</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp</id>; <updated>;2023-06- 16T00:05:18.255651Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/winfsp/winfsp"/>; <author>; <name>;mariuz</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=mariuz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/winfsp/winfsp/master/art/winfsp-glow .png" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;WinFsp 使开发人员能够将自己的文件系统编写为 Windows 计算机上的用户模式程序。它为自定义文件系统提供开发和运行时支持，允许通过标准 Windows 文件 API 访问信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#winfsp-windows-file-system-proxy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36322233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;历史计算机的详细微型模型</stitle>; <id>;https://www.miniatua.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-16T04:05:18.256122 Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.miniatua.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;zwieback</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =zwieback</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.miniatua.com/work/wopr/img/small_preview.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：147px；" />;<br />;非常详细的收藏品和手工制作的微型比例模型 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#detailed-miniature-models-of-historic-computer" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36351041" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;蜡烛制造者的请愿书 (1845)</stitle>; <id>;https://sites.middlebury.edu /econ0450f10/files/2010/08/bastiat.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T04:05:18.257045Z</更新>; <link href="https://sites.middlebury.edu/econ0450f10/ files/2010/08/bastiat.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;mutant_glofish</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mutant_glofish</uri>; </author>; < content type="html">;Frédéric Bastiat 是一位法国经济学家，以支持自由贸易和反对李嘉图经济学而闻名。在他的文章中，他讨论了面临来自太阳的竞争的蜡烛和其他灯相关产品制造商的请愿书。他们提议关闭自然光以创造对人造光的需求，这将有利于各行各业和农业。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#petition-of-the-candlemakers-1845" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36337851" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;序列图，UML 给软件开发带来的唯一好处</stitle>; <id>;https://www.mermaidchart.com/blog/posts/sequence-diagrams-the- good-thing-uml-brought-to-software-development</id>; <更新>;2023-06-15T17:05:18.257501Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.mermaidchart.com/blog /posts/sequence-diagrams-the-good-thing-uml-brought-to-software-development"/>; <author>; <name>;knsv</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=knsv</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.mermaidchart.com/blog/posts/images/seq-simple.png" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：137 像素；" />;<br />;当您记录系统的不同部分以及这些部分相互交互的各种方式时，序列图真的很有用。序列图描述系统内的操作并映射发送消息的内容和时间。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sequence-diagrams-the-only-good-thing-uml-brought-to-software-development" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36342931" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;CUDA 加速光线追踪器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/maxilevi/raytracer</id>; <更新>;2023-06-16T02:05:18.257950Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/maxilevi/raytracer"/>; <author>; <name>;maxilevi</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=maxilevi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/maxilevi/raytracer/master/ screenshots/free_france_alternative.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;这是一个用 C++ 从头开始​​编写的光线追踪器。它支持使用 C++ 11 线程和 CUDA 的 CPU 和 GPU 计算。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cuda-accelerated-raytracer" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36349893" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;在 OCaml 中玩 Atari 游戏</stitle>; <id>;https://www.janestreet.com/tech-talks/playing-atari-games-in-ocaml/</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-16T06:05:18.258411Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.janestreet.com/tech-talks/playing-atari-games-in-ocaml/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;lnyan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lnyan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.janestreet.com/static/img/share-image.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了如何使用机器学习来玩 Atari 游戏，特别是使用 OCaml。它涵盖了监督学习的概念和构建分类器的挑战。本文还介绍了 PyTorch，这是一个可在 OCaml 中用于机器学习任务的张量库。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#playing-atari-games-in-ocaml" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36336519" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
